Use a [i:{0}] in the Desert Biome
The scourge of the desert delved back into the sand.
Instructions.Translation: 荒漠灾虫潜入旱海之中。

Instructions.Origin: Can spawn naturally in the Sunken Sea
Instructions.Translation: 荒漠灾虫后自然刷新在沉沦之海

Instructions.Origin: The Giant Clam returns into hiding in its grotto.
Instructions.Translation: 巨像蛤重返水下岩窟之中。

Instructions.Origin: Use a [i:{0}] in the Mushroom Biome
Instructions.Translation: 在发光蘑菇地使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: The mycleium crab has lost interest.
Instructions.Translation: 菌生蟹失去了对你的性趣。

Instructions.Origin: Kill a Cyst in the Corruption or use a [i:{0}] in the Corruption
Instructions.Translation: 杀死刷新在腐化之地的腐化囊或在腐化之地使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: The corrupted colony began searching for a new breeding ground.
Instructions.Translation: 腐化之源开始搜寻下一处繁衍之所。

Instructions.Origin: Kill a Cyst in the Crimson or use a [i:{0}] in the Crimson
Instructions.Translation: 杀死刷新在猩红之地的血肉囊或在猩红之地使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: The parasitic hive began searching for a new host.
Instructions.Translation: 寄生意志开始搜寻下一位不幸宿主。

Instructions.Origin: The gelatinous monstrosity achieved vengeance for its breathren.
Instructions.Translation: 归元凝一的丑恶存在为它的同胞们完成了复仇。

Instructions.Origin: Use a [i:{0}] in the Snow Biome
Instructions.Translation: 在冰雪环境使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: Cryogen drifts away, carried on a freezing wind.
Instructions.Translation: 冰灵在冷冽彻骨的寒风中渐行渐远。

Instructions.Origin: Use a [i:{0}] in the Brimstone Crag
Instructions.Translation: 在硫火之崖使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: Brimstone Elemental withdraws to the ruins of her shrine.
Instructions.Translation: 硫磺火元素重返她曾经的圣殿，如今的废墟中。

Instructions.Origin: Use a [i:{0}] in the Sulphuric Sea or wait for it to spawn in the Sulphuric Sea
Instructions.Translation: 在硫磺海使用 [i:{0}] 召唤，或在硫磺海等待其自然刷新

Instructions.Origin: The Aquatic Scourge swam back into the open ocean.
Instructions.Translation: 渊海灾虫游回汪洋之中。

Instructions.Origin: If you wanted a fight, you should've came more prepared.
Instructions.Translation: 如果你渴望一场真正的战斗，那你之前应当多做准备。

Instructions.Origin: Kill 10 sand sharks after defeating Plantera or use a [i:{0}] in the Desert Biome
Instructions.Translation: 在花后沙尘暴杀死10只沙鲨或在沙漠使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: The apex predator of the sands disappears into the dunes...
Instructions.Translation: 终极掠食者隐匿到沙丘之下。

Instructions.Origin: By killing an unknown entity in the Ocean Biome
Instructions.Translation: 杀死海洋中的神秘生物

Instructions.Origin: The aquatic entities sink back beneath the ocean depths.
Instructions.Translation: 海中恐惧沉入大洋之底。

Instructions.Origin: Use an [i:{0}] at Night in the Astral Biome
Instructions.Translation: 在星辉瘟疫的夜晚使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: Astrum Aureus’ program has been executed. Initiate recall.
Instructions.Translation: 白金星舰指令已执行，开始返回。

Instructions.Origin: Use an [i:{0}] in the Jungle Biome
HOSTILE SPECIMENS TERMINATED. INITIATE RECALL TO HOME BASE.
Instructions.Translation: 威胁性实体已被抹除，启动归巢程序。

Instructions.Origin: The automaton of misshapen victims went looking for the true perpetrator.
Instructions.Translation: 那由暴君所屠戮之人的血肉，扭曲形成的战争巨兽，再次开始寻找真正的恶徒

Instructions.Origin: Defeat 3 empowered astral titans or use a [i:{0}] at Night
Instructions.Translation: 拜月教邪教徒被打败后，去星辉瘟疫杀死三只擎星者，或者在星辉瘟疫的夜晚使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: The infected deity retreats to the heavens.
Use a [i:{0}] in the Hallow or Underworld Biomes
Instructions.Translation: 在白天的神圣之地或地狱使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: The guardians must protect their goddess at all costs.
Instructions.Translation: 亵渎守卫必将保卫他们的至高女神，在所不辞。

Instructions.Origin: The failed experiment returns to its reproductive routine.
Instructions.Translation: 失败实验体重启繁衍日程。

Instructions.Origin: Use either [i:{0}] or [i:{1}] in the Hallow or Underworld Biomes
Instructions.Translation: 在白天的神圣之地或地狱使用 [i:{0}] 或 [i:{1}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: The Profaned Goddess vanishes in a burning blaze.
Instructions.Translation: 亵渎天神隐没在耀眼火光中。

Instructions.Origin: The rift in time and space has moved away from your reach.
Instructions.Translation: 时空间的裂隙从你所能触及之处隐去。

Instructions.Origin: Storm Weaver hid itself once again within the stormfront.
Instructions.Translation: 风暴编织者再度遁入风暴之中。

Instructions.Origin: The Devourer's assassin has finished its easy task.
Instructions.Translation: 神使干净利落地完成了暗杀，不费吹灰之力。

Instructions.Origin: Kill 30 phantom spirits or use a [i:{0}] in the Dungeon
Instructions.Translation: 杀死30只幻魂或在地牢使用 [i:{0}] 召唤

Instructions.Origin: The volatile spirits disperse throughout the depths of the dungeon.
Instructions.Translation: 飘渺不定的幽魂恶兽消失在地牢深处。

Instructions.Origin: Defeat the Acid Rain event post-Polterghast or fish using a [i:{0}] in the Sulphurous Sea
Instructions.Translation: 击败噬魂幽花后的酸雨事件或使用 [i:{0}] 在硫磺海钓鱼召唤

Instructions.Origin: The old duke disappears amidst the acidic downpour.
Instructions.Translation: 硫海遗爵消失在酸雨风暴中

Instructions.Origin: The Devourer of Gods has slain everyone and feasted on their essence.
Instructions.Translation: 噬神者撕裂了所有胆敢挑战神明之人，并大快朵颐他们的精魂。

Instructions.Origin: Use a [i:{0}] in the Jungle Biome
Yharon found you too weak to stay near your gravestone.
Instructions.Translation: 犽戎蔑视你的弱小，并不屑于在你的墓碑边多作停留。

Instructions.Origin: Use a [i:{0}] or wait for the invasion to occur naturally after the Eye of Cthulhu is defeated.
Instructions.Translation: 克苏鲁之眼后，使用 [i:{0}] 召唤，或等待自然发生

Instructions.Origin: The mysterious creatures of the sulphuric sea descended back into the ocean.
Instructions.Translation: 剧毒海洋的奇异生物返回海洋之中

Instructions.Origin: Use a [i:{0}] or [i:{1}] or wait for the invasion to occur naturally after the Aquatic Scourge is defeated
Instructions.Translation: 渊海灾虫后，使用 [i:{0}] 或 [i:{1}] 召唤，或等待自然发生

Instructions.Origin: The mysterious creatures of the sulphuric sea descended back into the deep ocean.
Instructions.Translation: 剧毒海洋的奇异生物返回深海之中

Instructions.Origin: Use a [i:{0}] or [i:{1}] or wait for the invasion to occur naturally after the Polterghast is defeated
Instructions.Translation: 噬魂幽花后，使用 [i:{0}] 或 [i:{1}] 召唤，或等待自然发生

Instructions.Origin: Defeat a Giant Clam after defeating the Desert Scourge
Instructions.Translation: 荒漠灾虫后在沉沦之海击败巨像蛤
击败骷髅王后在背包里有 [i:

Ark of the Cosmos' Superior Cousin
Ark of the Cosmos' Superior Cousin

Instructions.Translation: 被亵渎天神变成了灰烬.

Instructions.Origin: Could you be so kind as to, ah...check hell for me...? I left someone I kind of care about down there.
Instructions.Translation: 你能不能发点好心，额...帮我查一下地狱...？我把一个我关心的人留在下面了。

Instructions.Origin: I have this sudden shiver up my spine, like a meteor just fell and thousands of innocent creatures turned into monsters from the stars.
Instructions.Translation: 我的脊椎突然颤抖起来，就像流星落下，成千上万无辜的生物变成了来自群星的怪物。

Instructions.Origin: The dungeon seems even more restless than usual, watch out for the powerful abominations stirring up in there.
Instructions.Translation: 地牢似乎比平时更不安宁，小心里面强大的憎恨之物激起的怒火。

Instructions.Origin: Seems like extinguishing that butterfly caused its life to seep into the hallowed areas, try taking a peek there and see what you can find!
Instructions.Translation: 就好像那只扑火的蝴蝶使它的生命渗入了圣域，试着窥视那里，看看你能找到什么！

Instructions.Origin: I've heard there is a portal of antimatter absorbing everything it can see in the dungeon, try using the Rune of Kos there!
Instructions.Translation: 我听说有一个反物质之门吸收了它在地牢里看到的一切，试试在那里使用宇宙符文吧！

Instructions.Origin: I don't feel very safe; I think there's pigs following me around and it frightens me.
Instructions.Translation: 我感到不太安全，我觉得这有贪婪之物正在跟着我，这让我害怕。

Instructions.Origin: just looks at me funny and I'm not sure how I feel about that.
Instructions.Translation: 只看着我很有趣而我不知道我对此有何感受。

Instructions.Origin: to quit trying to throw me out of town, it's not going to work.
Instructions.Translation: 想把我赶出镇子，那是不存在的。

Instructions.Origin: I'll take up her offer and meet with her at the back of
Instructions.Translation: ，我会接受她的建议并且会和她会见于

Instructions.Origin: My home here has an extensive history and a mysterious past. You'll find out quickly just how extensive it is...
Instructions.Translation: 我这里的家有着悠久的历史和神秘的过去。你很快就会发现它有多么广博...

Instructions.Origin: I have unique items if you show me that you have bested the guardian of this jungle.
Instructions.Translation: 如果你打败了这片丛林的守护者,我会给你展示我独特的物品。

Instructions.Origin: This is as good a time as any to pick up the best ingredients for potions.
Instructions.Translation: 这是一个很好的时间来挑选最好的药水成分。

Instructions.Origin: I have a feeling we're going to have absolutely fantastic parties with

Instructions.Translation: 周围举办非常棒的派对！

Instructions.Origin: I think my light display is turning into an accidental bug zapper. At least the monsters are enjoying it.
Instructions.Translation: 我想我的灯光变成了个意料之外的机器。但至少，怪物们会喜欢它的。

Instructions.Origin: Ooh! I love parties where everyone wears a scary costume!
Instructions.Translation: 哦！我爱这样每个人都穿着奇服异装的派对！

Instructions.Origin: A little sickness isn't going to stop me from doing my work as an artist!
Instructions.Translation: 一点点的不舒服无法阻止我身为画家的工作！

Instructions.Origin: There's a surprising art to this area. A sort of horrifying, eldritch feeling. It inspires me!
Instructions.Translation: 这个地区有一种惊人的艺术。这种感觉令人感到震撼。它鼓舞了我！

Instructions.Origin: would let me paint him like one of his French girls?!
Instructions.Translation: 会让我把他画得像个法国女孩？！

Instructions.Origin: I'm not exactly suited for this cold weather. Still looks pretty, though.
Instructions.Translation: 我不适应这种寒冷的天气。不过，看起来还是挺漂亮的。

Instructions.Origin: I hate sand. It's coarse, and rough and gets in my paint.
Instructions.Translation: 我讨厌沙子。它很不平滑，很粗糙，会沾到我的油漆里。

Instructions.Origin: Do you think unicorn blood could be used as a good pigment or resin? No I'm not going to find out myself.
Instructions.Translation: 你认为独角兽的血可以用作一种好的颜料色素吗？不，我不会自己去找的。

Instructions.Origin: I can't work in this environment. All of my paint just floats off.
Instructions.Translation: 我无法在这种环境下工作。我所有的油漆都掉了。

Instructions.Origin: Painting the tortoises in a still life isn't going so well.
Instructions.Translation: 在静物画中画乌龟不太好。

Instructions.Origin: I can't paint a still life if the fruit grows legs and walks away.
Instructions.Translation: 如果水果长腿跑路了，我就不能画静物画了。

Instructions.Origin: On the canvas, things get heated around here all the time. Like the environment!
Instructions.Translation: 在画布上，任何时候东西都会被加热，就像环境一样！

Instructions.Origin: Sorry, I'm all out of watercolors. They keep evaporating.
Instructions.Translation: 不好意思，水彩画脱销了，它们总是在被热卖。

Instructions.Origin: Roses, really? That's such an overrated thing to paint.
Instructions.Translation: 玫瑰，是吗？那画起来确实很难。

Instructions.Origin: Fun fact! Sulphur was used as pigment once upon a time! Or was it Cinnabar?
Instructions.Translation: 有趣的事实！硫磺曾经被用作颜料！还是朱砂来着？

Instructions.Origin: Easiest landscape I've ever painted in my life.
Instructions.Translation: 这是我这辈子画过的最简单的风景画。

Instructions.Origin: Space just got way too close for comfort.
Instructions.Translation: 这空间太小了，让人感到难受

Instructions.Origin: There's a dark solar energy emanating from the moths that appear during this time. Ah, the moths as you progress further get more powerful...hmm...what power was Yharon holding back?
Instructions.Translation: 这段时间出现的飞蛾散发出一种黑暗的太阳能量。啊，飞蛾随着你的发展也变得越来越强大……嗯……犽戎之前没有使出他的全部力量？

Instructions.Origin: That starborne illness sits upon this land like a blister. Do even more vile forces of corruption exist in worlds beyond?
Instructions.Translation: 那星辉瘟疫像水泡一样存在于这片土地上。难道世界上还有更多邪恶地形吗

Instructions.Origin: My ancestor was lost here long ago. I must pay my respects to her.
Instructions.Translation: 我的祖辈很久以前就走了。我必须向她表示敬意。

Instructions.Origin: I'm not here for any reason! Just picking up mushrooms for uh, later use.
Instructions.Translation: 我才不想呆在这！我在这是为了捡蘑菇，呃，留着以后用。

Instructions.Origin: Please don't catch space lice. Or
Instructions.Translation: 请不要抓太空虱子，或者

Instructions.Origin: lice. Or just lice in general.
Instructions.Translation: 虱子，或者仅仅是普通的虱子

Instructions.Origin: is always trying to brighten my mood...even if, deep down, I know she's sad.
Instructions.Translation: 总是想让我心情愉快…即使，我知道她的内心深处很伤心。

Instructions.Origin: I hate to break it to you, but you don't have hair to cut or style, hun.
Instructions.Translation: 我不想打发你走，但是你的头发确实不需要剪，也没有发型。嗯...

Instructions.Origin: They look so cute and yet, I can feel their immense power just by being near them. What are you?
Instructions.Translation: 它们看上去如此可爱，然而一靠近它们，我就能感受到它们恐怖的力量。你怎么看？

Instructions.Origin: Aww, they're so cute, do they have names?
Instructions.Translation: 哇偶，它们太可爱了，你为它们起名字了吗？

Instructions.Origin: Hey, is it just me or have my pockets gotten lighter ever since
Instructions.Translation: 嘿，是我减肥了，还是我的钱包在

Instructions.Origin: You know...we haven't had an invasion in a while...
Instructions.Translation: 你知道…我们已经有一段时间没有入侵了...

Instructions.Origin: That's the biggest moth I've ever seen for sure. You'd need one big gun to take one of those down.
Instructions.Translation: 那是我见过的最大的蛾子。你得需要一把大枪才能把它们给射下来。

Instructions.Origin: Is it me or are your weapons getting bigger and bigger?
Instructions.Translation: 是我越来越小，还是你的武器越来越大？

Instructions.Origin: Each night seems only more foreboding than the last. I feel unthinkable terrors are watching your every move.
Instructions.Translation: 每天晚上似乎都比昨天更不祥。你的一举一动让我感到不可思议的恐惧。

Instructions.Origin: Are you daft?! Turn off those lamps!
Instructions.Translation: 你制杖吗？！快把那些破灯关掉！

Instructions.Origin: If this acid rain keeps up, there'll be a shortage of Dirt Blocks soon enough!
Instructions.Translation: 如果这场酸雨持续下去，很快就会出现土块短缺的情况！

Instructions.Origin: What do you mean your traps aren't making the cut? Don't look at me!
Instructions.Translation: 你说你的机关没成功是什么意思？和我没关系！
呃...我的夜灯需要开着吗？

Instructions.Origin: , but I, ah...I have my eyes on someone else.
Maybe I should've waterproofed my gadgets... They're starting to corrode.
Instructions.Translation: 也许我应该给我的小玩意儿加入防水功能...它们已经开始被腐蚀了。

Instructions.Origin: is a little cruel, isn't she? I never claimed to be an expert on anything but ale!
Instructions.Translation: 有那么点无情不是吗？我从来没有声称自己是除了啤酒以外的任何东西的专家！

Instructions.Origin: Aye, I've heard of a mythical creature in the oceans, singing with an alluring voice. Careful when yer fishin out there.
Instructions.Translation: 是的，我听说有一种神秘的海洋生物，用迷人的声音唱歌。在外面钓鱼时要小心。

Instructions.Origin: I have to thank ye again for takin' care of that sea serpent. Or was that another one...
Instructions.Translation: 我要再次感谢你们照顾那条海蛇。或者那是另一条...

Instructions.Origin: . He ain't quite how the stories make him out to be though.
Instructions.Translation: 的传说，不过他不是很明白那些故事是怎么出来的。

Instructions.Origin: Twenty-nine bottles of beer on the wall...
Now this is a scene that I can admire any time! I feel like something is watching me though.
Instructions.Translation: 现在这一幕我可以随时欣赏！但我觉得好像有什么东西在看着我。

Instructions.Origin: It ain't much of a sight, but there's still life living in these waters.
Instructions.Translation: 虽然表面上一片死寂，但在这些水域里仍然有生命。

Instructions.Origin: Me ship might just sink from the acid alone.
Instructions.Translation: 我的船可能会因为酸性而沉没。

Instructions.Origin: All these moments will be lost in time. Like tears...in the rain.
Instructions.Translation: 所有这一刻都将随着时间流逝而消失。就像雨中的...眼泪。

Instructions.Origin: Always shoot for the moon! It has clearly worked before.
Instructions.Translation: 总是朝月亮开枪！很明显，这以前起过作用。

Instructions.Origin: Draedon? He's...a little 'high octane' if you know what I mean.
Instructions.Translation: 嘉登？如果你懂我的意思，我说他有点“高辛烷值”。

Instructions.Origin: Those oversized bugs terrorizing the jungle... Surely you of all people could shut them down!
Instructions.Translation: 那些吓人的丛林里的大虫子...你当然可以把他们干掉了！

Instructions.Origin: Those screams...I'm not sure why, but I feel like a nameless fear has awoken in my heart.
Instructions.Translation: 那些尖叫…不知道为什么，但我觉得一种莫名的恐惧已经在我的心中醒来。

Instructions.Origin: I can faintly hear ghostly shrieks from the dungeon...and not ones I'm familiar with at all. Just what is going on in there?
Instructions.Translation: 我能隐约听到地牢里的鬼哭嚎叫……而我根本不熟悉这些。那里发生了什么？

Instructions.Origin: Whatever that thing was, I'm glad it's gone now.
Instructions.Translation: 不管那东西是什么，我很高兴它现在没了。
休斯顿，我们遇上麻烦了。

Instructions.Origin: Just what is that contraption? It makes my Teleporters look like child's play!
Instructions.Translation: 那是什么玩意儿？它使我的传送机看起来像个儿童玩具！

Instructions.Origin: Yep! I'm also considering being a space pirate now.
Instructions.Translation: 是的！我现在也在考虑当一名太空大盗。

Instructions.Origin: Some of my machines are starting to go haywire thanks to this Astral Infection. I probably shouldn't have built them here
Instructions.Translation: 由于星辉瘟疫，我的一些机器开始出故障。我可能本不该在这里修建的

Instructions.Origin: I'm sorry I really don't have any Unicorn proof tech here, you're on your own.
Instructions.Translation: 对不起，我这里真的没有独角兽保护技术，你自己来吧。

Instructions.Origin: Have you seen those gemstone creatures in the caverns? Their colors are simply breathtaking!
Instructions.Translation: 你看到洞穴里那些宝石生物了吗？它们的颜色简直令人叹为观止！

Instructions.Origin: BAH! Doesn't seem like I'll ever be able to quarrel with the debts of the town again!
Instructions.Translation: 呸！好像我没必要因镇上的债务争吵了！

Instructions.Origin: Where and how are you getting all of this money?
Instructions.Translation: 这些钱你到底是怎么弄来的？

Instructions.Origin: Perhaps with all that time you've got you could check those old ruins? Certainly something of value in it for you!
Instructions.Translation: 也许你有时间可以去检查一下那些古老的遗迹？对你来说那里会有有价值的东西！

Instructions.Origin: Devourer of what, you said? Devourer of Funds, if its payroll is anything to go by!
Instructions.Translation: 你说什么吞噬者？资金吞噬者，如果它的工资能是任何东西！
我的天！那根拐杖太装逼了！

Instructions.Origin: God Slayer Dynamite? Boy do I like the sound of that!
Instructions.Translation: 弑神者雷管？我喜欢那声音！

Instructions.Origin: I happen to have several Angel Statues at the moment, a truely rare commodity. Want one?
Instructions.Translation: 我现在拥有好几个天使雕像，那可真是稀世珍品啊！你要来一个吗？

Instructions.Origin: I deeply appreciate you rescuing me from being trapped within my frozen castle... It's been many, many years...
Instructions.Translation: 我非常感谢你把我从冰冻的城堡里解救出来。已经过去很多年了...

Instructions.Origin: Thank you for saving me...though now I admit I am without a home since mine got destroyed.
Instructions.Translation: 谢谢你救了我…不过我承认自从我的住宅被毁后我就没有家了。

Instructions.Origin: I must admit...I am not quite used to this weather. It's too warm for my taste...
Instructions.Translation: 我必须承认…我不太习惯这种天气。这对我来说太暖和了...

Instructions.Origin: My dear! What is it you would like to talk about today?
Instructions.Translation: 亲爱的！你今天想谈点什么？

Instructions.Origin: Why...I don't have to worry about any time of the day! If it is hot...then I can use my ice magic to cool down!
Instructions.Translation: 为什么…我一天中任何时候都不用担心！如果很热…我可以用我的冰魔法来降温！

Instructions.Origin: I do usually prefer a spot of humidity for my ice magic. It likes to come out as steam when it's too hot and dry...
Instructions.Translation: 我喜欢在潮湿的地方使用冰魔法。它就像太热而干的时候冒出的蒸汽...

Instructions.Origin: Magic is a skill that must be learned and practiced! You seem to have an inherent talent for it at your age. I have spent all of my life honing it...
Instructions.Translation: 魔术是一项必须学习和练习的技能！在现在这个时代，你们似乎天生就有这种天赋。我一辈子都在磨练魔法..

Instructions.Origin: Why ice magic, you ask? Well, my parents were both pyromaniacs...
Instructions.Translation: 你问为什么是冰魔法？呃，我父母都是纵火狂...

Instructions.Origin: There be monsters lurking in the darkness. Most...unnatural monsters.
Instructions.Translation: 黑暗中潜伏着怪物。大多数是…不自然的怪物。

Instructions.Origin: You could break the icy stillness in the air tonight.
Instructions.Translation: 今晚你可以打破空气中冰冷的寂静。

Instructions.Origin: Hmm...some would say that an unforeseen outside force is the root of the blood moon...
Instructions.Translation: 嗯…有人会说一种无法预料的外力是导致血月的根源...

Instructions.Origin: I was once the greatest Archmage of ice that ever hailed the lands. Whether or not that is still applicable, I am not sure...
Instructions.Translation: 我曾经是世界上最伟大的冰大法师。不管现在是不是，我也不确定...

Instructions.Origin: There used to be other Archmages of other elements. I wonder where they are now...if they are also alive...
Instructions.Translation: 以前还有其他元素的大法师。我想知道他们现在在哪里…如果他们还活着的话...

Instructions.Origin: Oh...I wish I could tell you all about my life and the lessons I have learned, but it appears you have a great many things to do...
Instructions.Translation: 哦…我希望我能告诉你我的生活和我学到的教训，但似乎你有很多事情要做...

Instructions.Origin: I assure you, I will do my best to act as the cool grandfather figure you always wanted.
Instructions.Translation: 我向你保证，我会尽我所能扮演你一直想要的酷老头形象。

Instructions.Origin: Sometimes...I feel like all I'm good for during these events is making ice cubes and slushies.
Instructions.Translation: 有时候…我觉得在这些活动中我能做的就是做冰块和冰泥。

Instructions.Origin: Tread carefully, my friend... Now that the Moon Lord has been defeated, many powerful creatures will crawl out to challenge you...
Instructions.Translation: 小心点，我的朋友...现在月亮领主已经被击败了，许多强大的生物将出来挑战你...

Instructions.Origin: I feel the balance of nature tilting farther than ever before. Is it due to you, or because of the events leading to now...?
Instructions.Translation: 我感到自然的平衡比以往任何时候都更被破坏。是因为你，还是因为现在将发生的事情...

Instructions.Origin: I felt a sudden chill down my spine. I sense something dangerous stirring in the Abyss...
Instructions.Translation: 我突然感到脊背发冷。我感觉到一些危险的东西在深渊中欲动。。。

Instructions.Origin: ...Where is Lord Yharim? He must be up to something...
Instructions.Translation: ……亚利姆在哪里？他一定在搞什么事情..
还老，你可以别再问我了...

Instructions.Origin: What an adorable tiny companion you have! Where in the world did you find such a...creature...? Actually, I'd rather not know.
Instructions.Translation: 你有一个多么可爱的宠物啊！你到底在哪里找到这样一个...生物...？实际上，我宁愿不知道。

Instructions.Origin: ...just between us, I think I forgot my soul in the ice castle. If you see it, please do let me know.
Instructions.Translation: ……就在我们之间，我想我把灵魂忘在了冰冻城堡里。如果你看到了，请告诉我。

Instructions.Origin: It wouldn't be the first time something unknown and powerful dropped from the heavens...I would tread carefully if I were you...
Instructions.Translation: 这不会是第一次天上掉下来一个未知而强大的东西…如果我是你我会很小心...

Instructions.Origin: We expect you to turn in a perfect performance!
Instructions.Translation: 我们期待你的完美演出！

Instructions.Origin: I could smell my vodka from MILES away!
Instructions.Translation: 我在几英里外闻到我的伏特加味！

Instructions.Origin: Have any spare rooms available? Preferably candle-lit with a hefty supply of booze.
Instructions.Translation: 有空房吗？最好是点着蜡烛有很多很多酒的。

Instructions.Origin: Hey! Nice night. I'm gonna make some Bloody Marys. Celery included. Want one?
Instructions.Translation: 嘿！晚安。我要做一些血腥玛丽。里面有芹菜。想要一个吗？

Instructions.Origin: More blood for the blood gods!
Everyone else is so rude tonight. If they don't get over it soon I'll break down their doors and make them!
Instructions.Translation: 今晚其他人都很粗鲁。如果他们不快点好起来，我就私闯民宅把他们收拾一顿了！

Instructions.Origin: Being drunk I have no moral compass atm.
Instructions.Translation: 我喝醉了就没道德底线了。

Instructions.Origin: Nothard/10, if I fight bosses I wanna feel like screaming 'OH YES DADDY!' while I die repeatedly.
Instructions.Translation: 不，如果我和Boss打架，我想我会在我又双叒叕死了的时候喊着“未成年吗”！

Instructions.Origin: Like I always say, when you're drunk you can put up with a lot more.
Instructions.Translation: 就像我常说的，喝醉了就可以忍受更多。

Instructions.Origin: I'm literally balls drunk off my sass right now.
Instructions.Translation: 我现在简直是喝得烂醉如泥。

Instructions.Origin: I'm either laughing because I'm drunk or because I've lost my mind. Probably both.
Instructions.Translation: 我不是因为喝醉了才笑，是因为我疯了。或者可能两者都有。

Instructions.Origin: When I'm drunk I'm way happier...at least until the talking worms start to appear.
Instructions.Translation: 当我喝醉的时候，我会更快乐…至少直到话痨虫出现之前。

Instructions.Origin: I should reprogram the whole game while drunk and send it back to the testers.
Instructions.Translation: 我应该在喝醉的时候重新编程整个游戏，然后把它送回测试人员那里。

Instructions.Origin: What a great day, might just drink so much that I get poisoned again.
Instructions.Translation: 多么美好的一天，可能我喝得太多了，我又中毒了。

Instructions.Origin: Now I want to get alcohol, first drinks are on me!
Instructions.Translation: 现在我想喝酒，第一杯酒我请客！

Instructions.Origin: Here's a challenge...take a drink whenever you take a hit. Oh wait, you'd die.
Instructions.Translation: 这是一个挑战…当你挨打的时候喝一杯。哦，等等，你会死的。

Instructions.Origin: Well I was planning to light some candles in order to relax...ah well, time to program while drunk.
Instructions.Translation: 好吧，我正打算点燃一些蜡烛来放松一下……啊，好吧，是时候边喝边编程了。

Instructions.Origin: Yes, everyone knows the mechworm is buggy.
Instructions.Translation: 是的，每个人都知道毁灭者是辣鸡。

Instructions.Origin: Are you sure you're 21? ...alright, fine, but don't tell anyone I sold you this.
Instructions.Translation: 你确定你21岁了？...好吧，好吧，但别告诉任何人我卖给你这个。

Instructions.Origin: Drink something that turns you into a magical flying unicorn so you can be super gay.
Instructions.Translation: 喝点能让你变成魔法飞行独角兽的东西，这样你就可以成为超级同性恋了。

Instructions.Origin: Did anyone ever tell you that large assets cause back pain? Well, they were right.
Instructions.Translation: 有人告诉过你有钱会引起痛苦吗？嗯，他们是对的。

Instructions.Origin: You'll always find me at parties where booze is involved...well, you'll always find booze where I'm involved.
Instructions.Translation: 你总会在派对上发现我喝酒…好吧，你总会在我喝酒的地方发现我。

Instructions.Origin: Shoot down the space invaders! Sexy time will be postponed if we are invaded by UFOs!
Instructions.Translation: 把这些外来入侵者射下来！如果我们被UFO入侵的话，OOXX的时间就会被推迟！

Instructions.Origin: God I can't wait to beat on some ice again!
Instructions.Translation: 天哪，我等不及要搞点冰了！

Instructions.Origin: Only things I am attracted to are fish women, women, men who look like women, and that's it.
Instructions.Translation: 唯一吸引我的是女人鱼，女人，还有看起来像女人的男人，就这样。

Instructions.Origin: Why did one creature need that many tentacles? ...actually, don't answer that.
Instructions.Translation: 为什么一个生物需要那么多触手...事实上，不要回答这个问题。

Instructions.Origin: There's chemicals in the water...and it's turning the frogs gay!
Instructions.Translation: 雨水里有化学物质…这蛤极了！

Instructions.Origin: I saw a ghost down by the old train tracks once flailing wildly at the lily pads, those were the days.
Instructions.Translation: 在那些日子，我看见一个鬼魂从旧铁轨上下来，疯狂地在莲花丛中舞动。

Instructions.Origin: I hear it's amazing when the famous purple-stuffed worm out in flap-jaw space with the tuning fork does a raw blink on Hara-kiri rock. I need scissors! 61!
Instructions.Translation: I hear it's amazing when the famous purple-stuffed worm out in flap-jaw space with the tuning fork does a raw blink on Hara-kiri rock. I need scissors! 61!(这是个梗）

Instructions.Origin: to stop calling me. He's not wanted.
Instructions.Translation: 别再找我了，他不和我的口味

Instructions.Origin: My booze will always be better than
's and nobody can convince me otherwise.
Instructions.Translation: 的好多了，关于这个事实没人说服得了我。

Instructions.Origin: is cool too but she'd outlive me.
was. It had to be the largest icicle I had ever seen.
Instructions.Translation: 有多么幸运。这是我这辈子见过最大的冰柱。

Instructions.Origin: You still can't stop me from selling alcohol and trying to move in with
Instructions.Translation: 你还是阻止不了我卖酒和与

Instructions.Origin: 's hands get sticky from all that...wax.
Instructions.Translation: 的手沾上了那些黏黏的浓稠的...蜂蜜的时候。

Instructions.Origin: works wonders for my hair...among other things.
Instructions.Translation: 对我的头发…还有其他的东西都有奇效。

Instructions.Origin: Is that a toy? Looks like something I'd carry around if I was 5 years old.
Instructions.Translation: 那是玩具吗？看起来像是我5岁时随身携带的东西。

Instructions.Origin: Nice...scales...did it get hot in here?
Instructions.Translation: 真好看的…鳞片…这里热吗？

Instructions.Origin: Oh yeah now you're drinking the good stuff! Do you like it? I created the recipe by mixing fairy dust, crystals, and other magical crap.
Instructions.Translation: 哦，是的，现在你喝的是好东西！你喜欢吗？我把仙尘、水晶和其他魔法物质混合在一起创造了这个配方。

Instructions.Origin: ...so, you're riding me huh? That's not weird at all.
Instructions.Translation: ...所以你骑着我嗯？好像没什么不对的。

Instructions.Origin: Are you coming on to me?
If I was a magical horse in this reality I'd be out in space swirling cocktails as I watch space worms battle for my enjoyment.
Instructions.Translation: 如果我在现实中是一匹魔法小马，我会在太空中旋转着鸡尾酒，看着太空虫为博得我的高兴而战。

Instructions.Origin: ! You're all pretty good! ...wait, who are you again?
Is this...what the world is like now? It seems so much more lifeless than when I saw it before I disappeared.
Instructions.Translation: 这是……现在的世界是什么样的？它看起来比我消失前看到它的最后一眼要死气沉沉得多

Instructions.Origin: Thank you for your service, my child, but I am afraid I am without a home now.
Instructions.Translation: 谢谢你的款待，孩子，但是我现在恐怕没有家了。

Instructions.Origin: My homeland may have dried up but the memories of my people still remain. I will not let them be in vain.
Instructions.Translation: 我的家乡可能已经干涸，但我关于那里的人的记忆仍然存在。我不会让他们失望的。

Instructions.Origin: There is a lot that you do not know about this world, specifically regarding the past. Much of it has been lost to history due to the many wars that plagued it.
Instructions.Translation: 关于这个世界，特别是关于过去的事情，你还有很多不知道的。由于许多战争的影响，它的大部分历史已经被遗忘。

Instructions.Origin: How can I survive on land? Ah, that is a secret. No, actually...I can breathe air like you!
Instructions.Translation: 我怎样才能在陆地上生存？啊，那是个秘密。不，事实上……我可以像你一样呼吸空气！

Instructions.Origin: Why do you ask if it's the males that carry the young? Don't your males carry their young?
Instructions.Translation: 你为什么要问是不是雄性携带幼崽？你们的雄性不带着它们的幼崽吗？

Instructions.Origin: There be monsters lurking in the darkness. Most...unnatural monsters.
Instructions.Translation: 黑暗中潜伏着怪物。大多数是……非自然的怪物。

Instructions.Origin: Most creatures look up at the moon and admire it. I look up and fear it.
Instructions.Translation: 大多数生物仰望月亮并欣赏它。我抬起头来并害怕它。

Instructions.Origin: Oh, me? I don't sleep, it's part of my nature.
Instructions.Translation: 哦，我？我不睡觉，这是我天生的。

Instructions.Origin: asked if my nose could be used as a vuvuzela. What is a vuvuzela?
Instructions.Translation: 问我，我的鼻子是否可以当呜呜祖拉。什么是呜呜祖拉？

Instructions.Origin: 's house at night. We're going to throw him to the Trashers.
Instructions.Translation: 的房子见我。我们一起去把他丢进硫磺海喂捣鱼。

Instructions.Origin: has not been roasted and digested by now, hanging around the sulphuric seas for so long. Peharps it got to his head.
Instructions.Translation: 在硫酸海中徘徊了这么久现在还没有被烤熟和消化。或许只剩头了。

Instructions.Origin: drinks to forget her troubled past.
Instructions.Translation: 为了忘记她过去的烦恼而喝酒。

Instructions.Origin: I'm never keen on these nights. They're so violent.
Instructions.Translation: 我从不喜欢这些夜晚。这太暴力了。
啊，我的孩子，好一个废物！

Instructions.Origin: Shouldn't you be wearing a clam bra?
Instructions.Translation: 你不应该穿着蛤蜊胸罩吗？

Instructions.Origin: The balance between light and dark is tipping. Stay strong, my child.
Instructions.Translation: 光明和黑暗之间的平衡已经被破坏。保持你的强大吧，我的孩子。

Instructions.Origin: Ah, you are starting to realize just how complicated this world is now. You are learning the story of what became of him.
Instructions.Translation: 啊，你开始意识到这个世界现在有多复杂了。你正在了解它曾经的故事。

Instructions.Origin: Do you ever get the feeling that something out there is watching you very carefully? Whatever it is, it's very small and sly, I think.
Instructions.Translation: 你有没有感觉到外面有什么东西在非常小心地看着你？不管是什么，我觉得它很小很狡猾。

Instructions.Origin: I must admit, I am quite shaken up now. Never would I have imagined that I would see one of the dark gods again. Not in this lifetime anyhow.
Instructions.Translation: 我必须承认，我现在很震惊。我从没想过我会再一次见到身为黑暗之神之一的它。至少我以为在这一生中都不会。

Instructions.Origin: Times like this I wish my home was still in one piece instead of evaporated away. I don't blame the witch for anything, it's just...oh, never mind.
Instructions.Translation: 像这样的时候，我希望我的家仍然是完好，而不是被蒸发掉。我不是因此在责怪那个巫女什么，只是……哦，没关系。

Instructions.Origin: I suppose that witch was mistaken. Defeating the Ceaseless Void and the Devourer has not caused our world to collapse... but I would not lower my guard if I were you.
Instructions.Translation: 我想巫女弄错了。战胜无尽虚空和吞噬者并没有导致我们的世界崩溃...但如果我是你，我不会降低我的警惕。

Instructions.Origin: Pockets of ore have appeared once more in the land. This will allow you to create the most powerful weaponry and armor imagined!
Instructions.Translation: 在这片土地上又出现了矿坑。这将让你创造出想象中最强大的武器和装甲！

Instructions.Origin: Lord Yharim possesses god-like strength. He may not even fight you at full power which is fortunate for you. His attacks may just kill you in one hit, so be careful.
Instructions.Translation: 亚利姆拥有上帝般的力量。他甚至可能不会尽全力与你战斗，这对你来说是幸运的。他的攻击可能会让你被秒杀，所以要小心。

Instructions.Origin: Draedon's style of confrontation is very...alien and hands-off. You may be more likely to fight any one of his mechs before taking him down.
Instructions.Translation: 嘉登的对峙风格非常……另类和旁观。你更有可能在把他打倒之前要先打败他的所有机械。

Instructions.Origin: The Devourer of God's cosmic armor is unique in that it is capable of not only protecting his body from tearing itself apart when ripping through the fabric of space and time, but also allows him to control his powers.
Instructions.Translation: 神明吞噬者的盔甲是独一无二的，它不仅能够保护他的身体在撕裂时空时自己不被撕裂，还能让他控制自己的力量。

Instructions.Origin: With the cosmic steel you can fashion many of your weapons into much more powerful forms.
Instructions.Translation: 有了宇宙锭，你可以将你的许多武器塑造成更强大的形式。

Instructions.Origin: The Devourer of Gods is extremely powerful. However, he is young, foolhardy, and very lazy. Perhaps if he had been given time to develop he would have turned into quite the threat.
Instructions.Translation: 神明吞噬者非常强大。然而，他年轻，鲁莽，非常懒惰。也许，如果给他时间去发展，他就会变成真正的威胁。

Instructions.Origin: Ah, the dragon Yharon is fickle. You may find that he will refuse to use his full power unless you are strong enough to unleash the power of the Dark Sun.
Instructions.Translation: 啊，丛林龙犽戎变化无常。你会发现，除非你有足够的力量释放日食的全部力量，否则他将拒绝使用他的全部力量

Instructions.Origin: The Rune of Kos holds a significant portion of Providence's brand of magic, easily distinguishable from all others. Activating it in certain places would have some...risky consequences.
Instructions.Translation: 宇宙符文有着亵渎天神魔法的一个重要部分，很容易区别于所有其他物品。在某些地方激活它会有一些……危险的后果。

Instructions.Origin: Ironic, is it not, that Statis was defeated by the very Sentinel his people fashioned their art of stealth from. Fate so often weaves cruel tales.
Instructions.Translation: 具有讽刺意味的是，斯塔提斯被他的人民所创造的哨兵打败了。命运常常产生这些残酷的故事。

Instructions.Origin: The Dungeon seems to be more active now. You may hear the faint whisperings of angry spirits who have not left to the Void...I would recommend searching there before taking on the Sentinels.
Instructions.Translation: 地牢现在似乎更活跃了。你可能会听到愤怒的灵魂的微弱的低语，它们还没有离开这片空地……我建议你在与神之哨兵交战之前先去那里探索一下。

Instructions.Origin: Your adventure focuses to the jungle it seems. The Dragonfolly and its swarming offspring should be eliminated before their numbers spiral out of control.
Instructions.Translation: 你的探险似乎集中在丛林。在它们的数量失控之前，干掉痴愚金龙和它虫潮一般的后代

Instructions.Origin: Ah...I can sense a powerful change in the weather. You may want to venture to the Sulphurous Seas once more during the rain to experience it.
Instructions.Translation: 啊……我能感觉到天气的强烈变化。你可能想在雨中再次到硫磺海去探索一下。

Instructions.Origin: Profaned creatures now lurk in the Hallow and in Hell. If you destroy enough and gather their essence together you shall be able to capture the attention of the Profaned Guardians.
Instructions.Translation: 亵渎的生物现在潜伏在圣地和地狱里。如果你杀得足够多，把它们的精华聚集在一起，你就能够吸引那些亵渎守卫的注意。

Instructions.Origin: The Profaned Guardians will do anything to protect their goddess. Makes sense they would die for her since they can be revived just as quickly.
Instructions.Translation: 亵渎守卫会尽一切努力保护他们的神。他们会为她而死是有道理的，因为他们可以很快复活。

Instructions.Origin: Touching Providence's offerings is usually a death wish. Shame that Yharim didn't think to just mess with her things to get her out of hiding.
Instructions.Translation: 触摸天神的祭品通常是一个死亡的愿望。真遗憾，亚利姆完全没想到只要把她的东西搞得乱作一团就能逼她现身。

Instructions.Origin: Providence is as much the sun goddess as much as the Moon Lord is the moon god. They are two sides of the same coin, choosing to remain neutral amongst our petty squabbles.
Instructions.Translation: 亵渎天神乃是耀日之神，一如月球领主乃是皓月之神。祂们是同一枚硬币的两面，选择在我们的争持中保持中立。

Instructions.Origin: The stories have it that when Providence faced and defeated Yharim and his forces she lost a lot of energy and reverted to a more skeletal form. She's merely a fraction of the power she was before.
Instructions.Translation: 传说中，当亵渎天神面对并击败亚利姆和他的部队时，她失去了很多能量，并恢复到一个更加空无的躯骸的形态。她只剩她以前的一小部分力量。

Instructions.Origin: The men at the front of the dungeon are performing a ritual to keep the Moon Lord contained in his prison. In order to gain Yharim's attention, however, you may need to defeat them.
Instructions.Translation: 地牢前面的人正在举行一个仪式，把月亮领主关在他的监狱里。然而，为了引起亚利姆的注意，你可能需要打败他们。

Instructions.Origin: The Abyss has become far more active than before. You might be able to mine some of the volcanic rubble contained within.
Instructions.Translation: 深渊比以前活跃得多。你也许可以开采其中的一些渊泉矿。

Instructions.Origin: The plague was just one of the many experiments authorized by Yharim to raze towns to the ground. This is probably one of the few he shelved for being too terrible.
Instructions.Translation: 就连瘟疫，也只是亚利姆授权的将城镇夷为平地的众多试验之一。这可能是他为数不多的因为太可怕而被搁置的项目之一。

Instructions.Origin: You will find more ores have been unlocked due to the magic sealing them away being dispelled. Some of them may require more than just the ore itself to create.
Instructions.Translation: 你会发现更多的矿石已经被解锁，因为魔法曾将它们封印并消散。其中一些可能需要的不仅仅是矿石本身。

Instructions.Origin: I would recommend saving some of your old items. You never know if you can engineer them into stronger weapons in the future.
Instructions.Translation: 我建议您保存一些旧的物品。你永远不知道你是否能在未来把它们改造成更强大的武器。

Instructions.Origin: Once those mechanical creations have been defeated you would do well to seek out the crippled clone of the witch, Calamitas. It might provide some useful weaponry.
Instructions.Translation: 一旦那些机械造物被击败，你最好去寻找巫女的克隆体，灾厄之眼。它可能会提供一些有用的武器。

Instructions.Origin: If you take an idol down to the Brimstone Crags you might be able to see just what is lurking in the shadows.
Instructions.Translation: 如果你把一个人偶带到硫火之崖边上，你也许能看到隐藏在阴影里的东西。

Instructions.Origin: The Brimstone Crags...Yharim despised that place, and did everything he could to raze it to the ground. It might explain a few things about him.
Instructions.Translation: 硫火之崖……亚利姆鄙视那个地方，尽一切努力把它夷为平地。这也许可以解释一些关于他的事情。

Instructions.Origin: The witch just might offer you an opportunity for a challenge if you are willing to fight during the night.
Instructions.Translation: 如果你愿意在夜里战斗，巫女可能会给你一个挑战它的机会。

Instructions.Origin: If you've gathered the souls used to power those automatons head once more to the jungle. You will find a powerful enemy to fight, which will unleash the full fervor of the jungle once defeated. Do not underestimate it!
Instructions.Translation: 如果你已经收集了那些用来驱动这些机械的灵魂，那么你可以再次前往丛林。你会发现一个强大的敌人与之战斗，一旦击败它将释放出丛林的全部能量。小心为好！

Instructions.Origin: Be careful when defeating Plantera and the Golem. You might accidentally unleash a new threat in the jungle that needs to be quelled.
Instructions.Translation: 打败世纪之花和石巨人后要小心。你可能会在丛林中意外地发现一个新的威胁，而这个威胁需要被平息。

Instructions.Origin: When exploring the jungle temple be careful. You may not wish to disturb the Lihzard's idol, the Golem. It's quite the destructive force.
Instructions.Translation: 当探索丛林神庙时要小心。你也许不想打扰蜥蜴的巨像，那就是石巨人。它有着毁灭性的力量。

Instructions.Origin: Have you heard of the story of Archmage Permafrost? Rumor has it he's been locked away in an icy prison by Lord Yharim. Perhaps you would be able to free him if Cryogen was destroyed.
Instructions.Translation: 你听说过佩码·福洛斯特大法师的故事吗？有传言说他被亚利姆关在冰冷的监狱里。如果那被破坏了，也许你可以解救他。

Instructions.Origin: There are rumors of ores that lay in latency. When you defeat certain bosses you will undo the ancient magic which conceals those materials.
Instructions.Translation: 这里有矿石隐藏着。当你击败某些Boss时，你将解除隐藏这些材料的古老魔法。

Instructions.Origin: Have you heard of the Brimstone Crags? It was once a grand kingdom, not too different from my own. However, it also met a similar fate. I would not advise going down there, unless you seek a painful death.
Instructions.Translation: 你听说过硫火之崖吗？它曾经是一个伟大的王国，和我的王国没有太大的不同。然而，它也遇到了类似的命运。我不建议你去那里，除非你想死得很痛苦。

Instructions.Origin: Ah yes, the Abyss. That trench is full of powerful creatures that could devour you in a heartbeat. I would explore the dungeon first.
Instructions.Translation: 啊，是的，深渊。那里到处都是强大的生物，它们能在一瞬间吞噬你。要是我我会先探索地牢。

Instructions.Origin: The Sulphurous Seas are dangerous. The toxic waters will burn your skin, but if you can brave them you will be able to reach the Abyss, where there are powerful weapons and dangers aplenty.
Instructions.Translation: 硫磺海是危险的。有毒的水会灼伤你的皮肤，但如果你能勇敢地面对它们，你就能到达深渊，那里有强大的武器以及危险。

Instructions.Origin: The Sulphurous Seas were created long ago, when Yharim's dungeon could no longer hold as many corpses as it needed to. Many of the bodies were dumped into the ocean. This, along with severe pollution from the heydays of Draedon's experiments have turned a paradise into a wasteland.
Instructions.Translation: 硫磺海是很久以前创造的，那时亚利姆的地牢已经不能容纳足够多的尸体了。许多尸体被扔进海里。这，再加上嘉登实验鼎盛时期的严重污染，把这片圣土变成了一片废土。

Instructions.Origin: Be careful what you attack in the
. You might just unveil a greater threat than what was there before.
Instructions.Translation: 。你可能会暴露出比以前更大的威胁

Instructions.Origin: Scattered across the lands are shrines dedicated to the gods. You can take whatever is in them, but a few items you may not be able to use until much later.
Instructions.Translation: 散布在大地上的是供奉神灵的神龛。你可以拿走里面的所有东西，但有些东西你可能要等很久之后才能使用。

Instructions.Origin: I'm assuming you've heard the legends that speak of the ninja, Statis? There are some who say that if you were able to defeat the gods which his clan once worshipped you would be able to harness some of his powers.
Instructions.Translation: 我猜你听说过有关忍者的传说吧，斯塔提斯？有人说，如果你能打败他家族曾经崇拜的诸神，你就可以利用一些他的力量。

Instructions.Origin: The dungeon is a dark place. None of us know of its true purpose, however, the ancient Eidolist cultists used it for worship before Lord Yharim took it over.
Instructions.Translation: 地牢是一个黑暗的地方。我们谁也不知道它的存在的意义，然而，在亚利姆接管它之前，远古的教徒用它来拜教

Instructions.Origin: used to be easily manageable and controlled by nature. However, the recent wars and pollution have tipped the balance out of favor.
Instructions.Translation: 过去很容易被自然所管理和控制。然而，最近的战争和污染使其失去了平衡。

Instructions.Origin: Oy, watch where you're going or I might just use you for dart practice.
Instructions.Translation: 嘿，走路瞧着点，我的飞镖可不长眼睛！

Instructions.Origin: Bet you'd look good as a pincushion, amiright?
Instructions.Translation: 你站在那肯定是想被扎成刺猬，是吧？

Instructions.Origin: Zombies don't dodge very well. Maybe you'll do a bit better.
Instructions.Translation: 僵尸们不怎么擅长躲避，但愿你比它们强一点。

Instructions.Origin: Hey, careful over there. I've rigged the place. One wrong step and you're going to get a knife in your forehead.
Instructions.Translation: 嘿，别靠近那边！我刚刚做了点手脚，踏错一步你下一秒可能就躺地板上了。

Instructions.Origin: You know what's really cool? Watching the glint of throwing stars as they reflect the moon.
Instructions.Translation: 对着月亮欣赏我的手里剑，那可真是酷毙了！

Instructions.Origin: You think those stars that fall occasionally would make good throwing weapons?
Instructions.Translation: 你觉得时不时从天上掉下来的那些落星会不会是很好的投掷武器？

Instructions.Origin: Statis' clan's got nothing on me. Mostly cause they're all dead.
Instructions.Translation: 斯塔提斯的部族可一点都不比我强，因为他们早就是死人了。

Instructions.Origin: Where is my party hat? Well, I stole it of course.
Instructions.Translation: 我的派对帽去哪了？对，就是我偷来的那顶。

Instructions.Origin: The nice thing about maps is I can track anything that has fallen.
Instructions.Translation: 地图最棒的一点是，如果天上有什么东西掉下来能够第一时间找到。

Instructions.Origin: Imagine how fast you could throw if you just had more hands.
Instructions.Translation: 想象一下，要是多几只手那得能扔的多快啊！

Instructions.Origin: I also take food for currency.
Instructions.Translation: 你没钱的话，给点吃的也行。

Instructions.Origin: Usually I only think of animals as food or target practice, but dragons are an exception.
Instructions.Translation: 通常来说动物只是食物或者活靶子，但龙是个例外。

Instructions.Origin: Anything is a weapon if you throw it hard enough.
Instructions.Translation: 只要够大力，任何物品都能当作武器。

Instructions.Origin: That's your chucking arm? You need to work out more.
Instructions.Translation: 就凭你这小胳膊也想投掷武器？去健健身吧。

Instructions.Origin: Listen here. It's all in the wrist, the wrist! Oh, forget it.
Instructions.Translation: 看好了，全靠手腕的巧劲，巧劲！哦，就当无事发生过。

Instructions.Origin: I don't think Mom and Dad are proud of the job I have right now.
Instructions.Translation: 我不觉得我的父母为我这份工作而自豪。

Instructions.Origin: Eh you know how it goes; steal from the rich, give to the poor. Of course, for a price.
Instructions.Translation: 你知道我是做什么的；劫富济贫。当然，中饱私囊。

Instructions.Origin: Want to hear about this one time I was stuck in a room with a rabid dog and a dead guy?
Instructions.Translation: 想听听我有次跟疯狗和死人被困在一间屋子里的故事吗？

Instructions.Origin: Argh snakes. For some reason it's always snakes.
Maybe I'm bitter. It's been a long time, so whatever. Just do a good job out there.
Instructions.Translation: 也许我过得挺苦的，已经有些年头了。不管怎样，做好自己分内的事。

Instructions.Origin: It's not stealing! I'm just borrowing it until I die!
Instructions.Translation: 这才不是偷！我只不过是借，死的时候再还DA☆ZE！

Instructions.Origin: Wouldn't be the first time I used my friends' remains as weapons.
Instructions.Translation: 我也不是第一次用我朋友的遗骸当作武器了。

Instructions.Origin: With all of this new stuff cropping up, looks like we got some easy loot and new items to craft up, eh? Well, YOU craft them, I'll steal em.
Instructions.Translation: 有了这么多新的材料，看起来我们可以制作不少新的物品了，对吧？实际上只有你会去做，我的都是偷的。

Instructions.Origin: Draedon thinks he can build awesome machines but he don't know how much crap I've stolen from him and sold by dismantling his drones.
Instructions.Translation: 嘉登认为他能造出惊人的机械，但他不会知道我偷拆他的无人机卖了多少钱。

Instructions.Origin: Gramma always said never to invade ancient temples or you'll be cursed and die. Let's say both of us attest that is untrue. We're still alive. Somewhat.
Instructions.Translation: Gramma总说入侵神庙的人不是死了就是被诅咒了。我俩就是活生生的反例。我们还活着，某种程度上。

Instructions.Origin: I heard that there's some really neat and awesome rogue items you can get. Show em to me if you ever get the time.
Instructions.Translation: 我听说现在你可以搞到些超棒的盗贼武器了，别忘了到时候给我看看。

Instructions.Origin: Providence HATES it when you take her stuff. I learned that the hard way.
Instructions.Translation: 普罗维登斯真的很讨厌别人拿她东西。别问我怎么知道的。

Instructions.Origin: You think I can get away with looting from ghosts? It ain't like they can pick things up.
Instructions.Translation: 你觉得我能抢劫幽灵，然后全身而退？我不觉得他们能捡起任何东西。

Instructions.Origin: Oh man, did you rip that off a shark!? Now that's a weapon!
Instructions.Translation: 哦老兄，你把这玩意从鲨鱼身上扯下来了！？现在它是一把武器了！

Instructions.Origin: I tried looting Storm Weaver's armor once. Before I could get a chunk of the stuff... well let's just say the bigger, fatter cosmic worm arrived and it didn't end well.
Instructions.Translation: 我试过从风暴编织者身上撬下壳来，在我得手之前...怎么说呢，那条更大更肥的宇宙蠕虫来了，我们闹得很不愉快。

Instructions.Origin: I'd rather not be here. This place has bad vibes, y'know? It brings back some unpleasant memories.
Instructions.Translation: 早知道我就不来这的。这地方氛围很糟糕你知道吗？我想起了一些不愉快的回忆。

Instructions.Origin: , but I took some of his stuff and replaced it with Angel Statues.
Instructions.Translation: 我把他的一些货物换成天使雕像了。

Instructions.Origin: 's drinks. She doesn't appreciate me right now so I'll go back to hiding.
Instructions.Translation: 的饮料。她不是很喜欢我，好了，我得继续回去躲着了。
身上那么多伤口我也有责任。

Instructions.Origin: Want in on a little secret? Since
always gets so much cash from you, I've been stealing some of it as we go. I need you to keep quiet about it, so here.
Instructions.Translation: 每次都拿走你那么多钱，我其实早就盯上他了。这件事我要你保密，给，拿着。

Instructions.Origin: Hey, if government officials can get tax, why can't I? The heck do you mean that these two things are nothing alike?
Instructions.Translation: 嘿，既然政府的人能收税，为什么我就不能？什么？你说我们完全没有可比性？
抱歉，我什么也给不了你。

Instructions.Origin: was once again impaled by Goldfish.
's essence was consumed by the devourer.
's essence was consumed by the devourer.
Hook location not found, switch(*) { case 54: ...
The ground is glittering with cyan light.
The ice caves are crackling with frigid energy.
Energized plant matter has formed in the underground.
Fossilized tree bark is bursting through the jungle's mud.
A godly aura has blessed the world's caverns.
A cold and dark energy has materialized in space.
A blood red inferno lingers in the night...
A protective spell has been lifted from the crags! You can now mine Charred Ore.
A plague has befallen the Jungle.
PLAGUE NUKE BARRAGE ARMED, PREPARING FOR LAUNCH!!!
Shrieks are echoing from the dungeon.
The calamitous beings have been inundated with bloodstone.
The Profaned Goddess has recognised your devotion to purity!
The abyssal spirits have been disturbed.
Wails echo through the dilapidated dungeon halls...
Long-dead prisoners seek their zealous revenge...
The souls released stir the acidic storms...
Alright, let's get started. Not sure why you're bothering.
You seem so confident, even though you are painfully ignorant of what has yet to transpire.
Everything was going well until you came along.
Brothers, could you assist me for a moment? This ordeal is growing tiresome.
Don't worry, I still have plenty of tricks left.
Hmm...perhaps I should let the little ones out to play for a while.
Even if you defeat me you would still have the lord to contend with!
He has never lost a battle!
Not even I could defeat him! What hope do you have!?
He has grown far stronger since we last fought...you stand no chance.
Well...I suppose this is the end...
Perhaps one of these times I'll change my mind...
You aren't hurting as much as I'd like...are you cheating?
At long last I am free...for a time. I'll keep coming back, just like you. Until we meet again, farewell.
Do you enjoy going through hell?
Don't get me wrong, I like pain too, but you're just ridiculous.
You must enjoy dying more than most people, huh?
Do you have a fetish for getting killed or something?
Alright, I'm done counting. You probably died this much just to see what I'd say.
You didn't die at all huh? Welp, you probably cheated. Do it again, for real this time...but here's your reward I guess.
One death? That's it? ...I guess you earned this then.
Two deaths, nice job. Here's your reward.
Third time's the charm. Here's a special reward.
Are you honestly that bad at dodging?
Of all my segments to get hit by...
A GOD DOES NOT FEAR DEATH!
You are no god...but I shall feast upon your essence regardless!
A star has fallen from the heavens!
The astral enemies have been empowered!
A faint ethereal click can be heard from the dungeon.
The seal of the stars has been broken! You can now mine Astral Ore.
A star-spawned horror tunnels through the astral infection.
The god of the stars draws near...
Something stirs in the warm desert sands...
My dragon deems you an unworthy opponent. You must acquire the power of the dark sun to witness his true power.
Death is active, enjoy the fun.
Death is not active, not fun enough for you?
Bosses will now kill you instantly.
Bosses will no longer kill you instantly.
Your soul is yours once more...
Iron Heart is active, don't die.
Iron Heart is not active, you can die again.
The air is getting warmer around you.
Hmm? Ah, another contender. Very well, may the ritual commence!
Hmm? Oh, you're still alive. Unexpected, but don't get complacent just yet.
Hmm? Persistent aren't you? Perhaps you have some hope of prosperity, unlike past challengers.
Hmm? Your perseverance is truly a trait to behold. You've come further than even the demigods in such a short time.
May your skills remain sharp for the last challenges.
Hmm? So you've made it to the final tier, a remarkable feat enviable by even the mightiest of the gods.
Go forth and conquer 'til the ritual's end!
Hmm? You expected a reward beyond this mere pebble? Patience, the true reward will become apparent in time...
The depths of the underground desert are rumbling...
The desert wind is blowing furiously!
You have been blessed by the Third Sage!
The Third Sage has rescinded its blessing...
A toxic downpour falls over the wasteland seas!
The sulphuric skies begin to clear...

Teleports you to the position of the mouse
Teleportation is disabled while Chaos State is active
Instructions.Translation:
将你传送到鼠标的位置
混沌状态下传送会被禁止

Instructions.Origin:
Capable of soaking up an endless amount of water
Cannot be used in the Abyss
Instructions.Translation:
可以吸入无限量的水
不能在深渊中使用

Instructions.Origin:
1 defense
Cannot be used in the Abyss
Instructions.Translation:
1防御
不能在深渊中使用

Instructions.Origin:
Summons a heart to provide light
Provides a small amount of light in the abyss
Instructions.Translation:
召唤一颗心脏提供光照
在深渊中提供少许光照

Instructions.Origin:
Creates a magical shadow orb
Provides a small amount of light in the abyss
Instructions.Translation:
召唤一颗魔法暗影珠
在深渊中提供少许光照

Instructions.Origin:
Summons a magic lantern that exposes nearby treasure
Provides a small amount of light in the abyss
Instructions.Translation:
召唤魔法灯笼，照亮周围的宝物
在深渊中提供少许光照

Instructions.Origin:
Provides light under water and extra mobility on ice
Provides a small amount of light in the abyss
Moderately reduces breath loss in the abyss
Instructions.Translation:
在水下提供光照，冰面上提供额外移动力
在深渊中提供少许光照
一定程度地缓解深渊造成的呼吸困难

Instructions.Origin:
Provides light under water
Provides a small amount of light in the abyss
Instructions.Translation:
在水下发光
在深渊中提供少许光照

Instructions.Origin:
Summons a magical fairy
Provides a moderate amount of light in the abyss
Instructions.Translation:
召唤魔法精灵
在深渊中提供适量的光照

Instructions.Origin:
Summons a pet flickerwick to provide light
Provides a moderate amount of light in the abyss
Instructions.Translation:
召唤宠物闪烁灯芯提供光照
在深渊中提供适量的光照

Instructions.Origin:
5 minute duration

Instructions.Origin:
+5 defense
5% increased rogue damage and 10% increased velocity
Rogue stealth builds while not attacking and not moving, up to a max of 70
Once you have built max stealth, you will be able to perform a Stealth Strike
Rogue stealth only reduces when you attack, it does not reduce while moving
The higher your rogue stealth the higher your rogue damage, crit, and movement speed

+5防御力
增加5%盗贼伤害和10%弹幕速度
不攻击时累积潜行值，移动时积累较慢，最大70点
一旦你的潜行值满，下一次盗贼攻击可施展潜伏攻击
盗贼潜行值只在攻击时下降，移动时不会下降
潜行值越高，你的盗贼伤害，暴击率，移动速度越高

Instructions.Origin:
+2 defense
5% increased rogue damage and critical strike chance
Grants immunity to fire blocks and temporary immunity to lava
Rogue stealth builds while not attacking and not moving, up to a max of 80
Once you have built max stealth, you will be able to perform a Stealth Strike
Rogue stealth only reduces when you attack, it does not reduce while moving
The higher your rogue stealth the higher your rogue damage, crit, and movement speed

Instructions.Translation:
+2防御力
增加5%盗贼伤害和暴击率
免疫方块灼烧，短时免疫岩浆
不攻击时累积潜行值，移动时积累较慢，最大80点

潜行值越高，你的盗贼伤害，暴击率，移动速度越高
在死亡模式下免疫高温

Instructions.Origin:
All ice-themed weapons receive a 10% damage bonus
Cold enemies will deal reduced contact damage to the player

Provides cold immunity in Death Mode

增加10%冰系武器伤害

在死亡模式下免疫寒冷

I'll be there in the blink of an eye

Teleportation is disabled while Chaos State is active
Boosts movement and fall speed by 10%
Works while in the inventory
to teleport to the position of the mouse

Creates a profaned crystal that charges power
Holding out the crystal slows the player down
At the end of its life, the crystal heals the player
The first object Xeroc ever created

Creates a super dummy
Regenerates 1 million life per second
Will not die when taking damage over time from debuffs
Right click to kill all super dummies

Fires crystals that explode and slow enemies down
This weapon scales with all your damage stats at once

Inflicts several long-lasting debuffs and splits on tile hits

Shots reduce enemy protection
This weapon scales with all your damage stats at once

Summons a spear that causes you to lunge towards the mouse position
The spear requires a charge-up. The longer the charge, the more strong the lunge
The spear disappears immediately if you are not holding this item while charging
If enough time has passed or the spear collides into a wall, the spear dies and the lunge ends

Summons a bulwark at the mouse position
The bulwark killed by enemies and all projectiles.
On death, the bulwark explodes into a rotating burst of shards
If an enemy is in the area of the shards, its next attack is much weaker. This effect has a cooldown
After a bit of time, the shards come together to reform the original bulwark.
Instructions.Translation:
在鼠标位置召唤一个堡垒
堡垒受到敌人和所有弹幕的伤害（包括友方的）。
死亡时，堡垒会炸成碎片（堡垒：我裂开了）
如果敌人在碎片区，那么敌人的下一次攻击会削减许多
一段时间后碎片会自动聚合并重新生成堡垒。

Instructions.Origin: This reformation can only happen {0} times.

If a bulwark already exists, using this item will relocate it
Instructions.Translation:
当召唤一个新的堡垒时，你会得到一个较短的冷却时间.
如果堡垒或碎片已经存在，那么再次使用此物品时会重新召唤。

A horror born of pollution and insatiable hunger; based on size alone this was merely a juvenile.
These scourge creatures are the largest aquatic predators and very rarely do they frequent such shallow waters.
Place in your inventory to gain immunity to the sulphurous waters and increase the stat gains from the Well Fed buff.
However, without the Well Fed buff your stats will decrease due to your insatiable hunger.

This twisted dreamscape, surrounded by unnatural pillars under a dark and hazy sky.
Natural law has been upturned. What will you make of it?

A titanic cyborg infected by a star-borne disease expelled from the belly of an ancient god.
The destruction of this creature will not prevent the spread of the disease.
Place in your inventory to gain increased jump speed in space.

God of the stars and largest vessel for the Astral Infection.
Though struck down from its place among the stars its remnants have gathered strength, aiming to take its rightful place in the cosmos once more.
Place in your inventory to gain increased movement speed in space.

We long ago feared the light of the red moon.
Many went mad, others died, but a scant few became blessed with a wealth of cosmic understanding.

An eye and now a brain.
Most likely another abomination spawned from this inchoate mass of flesh.
Allows you to teleport similar to the Rod of Discord while in the crimson. Place in your hotbar to use it.
Teleportation is disabled while Chaos State is active.
However, you become confused for a few seconds after you use it due to your overwhelming brain power.

Ah...this place.
The scent of broken promises, pain, and eventual death is heavy in the air...

The most powerful of the elementals, bent on exacting revenge upon the bloody inferno that demolished her home.
Finally put to rest, she will suffer no longer from the grief caused by the deaths of her people.
Place in your inventory to improve the inferno potion effect.

A failure of twisted scientific ambition; it appears our faulted arrogance over life has shown once more in the results.
Originally intended to be a clone of the Jungle Dragon, these were left to roam about the jungle, attacking anything in their path.

The witch unrivaled. Perhaps the only one amongst my cohorts to have ever given me cause for doubt.
Now that you have defeated her your destiny is clear.
Come now, face me.
Place in your inventory to die instantly from every hit.

You are indeed stronger than I thought.
Though the bloody inferno still lingers, observing your progress.
Place in your inventory to gain a boost to your minion slots but at the cost of reduced max health.

The rotten and forever-deteriorating landscape of infected life, brought upon by a deadly microbe long ago.
It is rumored that the microbe was created through experimentation by a long-dead race, predating the Terrarians.
Place in your inventory to prevent hive cysts from spawning.

A crab and its mushrooms, a love story.
It's interesting how creatures can adapt given certain circumstances.
Place in your inventory to gain the Mushy buff while underground or in the mushroom biome.
However, your movement speed will be decreased while in these areas due to you being covered in fungi.

This bloody hell, spawned from a formless mass of flesh that fell from the stars eons ago.
It is now home to many hideous creatures, spawned from the pumping blood and lurching organs deep within.
Place in your inventory to prevent perforator cysts from spawning.

The archmage's prison.
I am unsure if it has grown weaker over the decades of imprisonment.
Place in your inventory to gain a frost dash that freezes enemies, at the cost of slightly reduced defense due to your brittle body.

The great sea worm appears to have survived the extreme heat and has even adapted to it.
What used to be a majestic beast swimming through the water has now become a dried-up and
gluttonous husk, constantly on a voracious search for its next meal.
Place in your inventory for an increase to defense while in the desert or sunken sea.
However, you will deal decreased damage while in these areas due to being a husk of your former self.

A machine brought to life by the mighty souls of warriors, and built to excavate massive tunnels in planets to gather resources.
Could have proven useful if Draedon didn't have an obsession with turning everything into a tool of destruction.
Place in your inventory to gain a boost to your pick speed.
However, your max acceleration is decreased slightly due to you feeling heavier.

This serpent’s power to assimilate the abilities and energy of those it consumed is unique in almost all the known cosmos, save for its lesser brethren.
I would have soon had to eliminate it as a threat had it been given more time and creatures to feast upon.
Place in your inventory to boost the power of your true melee strikes by 50%.
However, due to your reckless nature you will take increased damage.

The mutant terror of the sea was once the trusted companion of an old king; he tamed it using its favorite treat.
Long ago, the creature flew in desperation from the raging bloody inferno consuming its home, ultimately finding its way to the ocean.
Place in your inventory for an increase to all damage, crit and movement speed while submerged in liquid.
However, while not submerged in liquid you will have slightly decreased damage, crit and movement speed due to feeling dried out.

Perhaps it was just a giant worm infected by the microbe, given centuries to feed and grow its festering body.
Seems likely, given the origins of this place.
Deadly microbes spawn around you while this is placed in your inventory.
However, you will have decreased life regen due to your skin rotting off.

That eye...how peculiar.
I sensed it watching you more intensely as you grew stronger.
Place in your inventory for night vision at night.
However, your vision is reduced during the day.

A primitive construct.
I admire the lihzahrd race for their ingenuity, though finding faith in such a flawed idol would invariably lead to their downfall.
Place in your inventory to gain increased defense while standing still.

A hive of clustered microbial-infected flesh.
I do not believe killing it will lessen the corruption here.
Place in your inventory for all of your projectiles to inflict cursed flames when in the corruption.
However, enemy spawn rates will be greatly reduced while in the corruption due to your overwhelmingly-putrid odor.

Only a fool could be caught by this pitiful excuse for a hunter.
Unfortunately, our world has no shortage of those.
Place in your inventory to gain a slight movement speed and jump boost.
However, your defense is slightly reduced due to your gelatinous body.

An odd pair of creatures; one seeking companionship and the other seeking sustenance.
Perhaps two genetic misfits outcast from their homes that found comfort in assisting one another.
Place in your inventory to gain increased max health while wearing the siren heart and treasure detect while wearing the strange orb.
Allows the young siren pet to move normally while outside of liquids.
However, if you're not submerged in liquid you will have decreased defense and damage reduction.

The gifted one that terminated my grand summoning so long ago with his uncanny powers over the arcane.
Someone I once held in such contempt for his actions is now...deceased, his sealing ritual undone...prepare for the end.
Your impending doom approaches...
Place in your inventory for an increase to all stats during the lunar event.
However, your vision is decreased due to eldritch knowledge damaging your mind.

I see you have awakened Draedon's old toys.
Once useful tools turned into savage beasts when their AIs went rogue, a mistake that Draedon failed to rectify in time.

What a waste.
Had it been fully restored it would have been a force to behold, but what you fought was an empty shell.
However, that doesn't diminish the immense potential locked within it, released upon its death.
Place in your inventory to gain an improved Gravity Globe that gives you an increase to all stats while upside down.
However, while not upside down you have permanent featherfall.

Take care to not disturb the deep waters of this world.
You may awaken something more terrifying than death itself.
Place in your inventory to prevent the mysterious siren lure from spawning.

Strange, to find out that the mutant terror of the seas was not alone in its unique biology.
Perhaps I was mistaken to classify the creature from its relation to pigrons alone.
Place in your inventory to convert negative effects from the Acid Rain debuff to positive effects.

An abomination of comingled flesh, bone, and organ, infested primarily by blood-slurping worms.
Place in your inventory for all of your projectiles to inflict ichor when in the crimson.
However, enemy spawn rates will be greatly increased while in the crimson due to your body excreting a sweet-smelling pus.

A horrific amalgam of steel, flesh, and infection, capable of destroying an entire civilization in just one onslaught.
Its plague nuke barrage can leave an entire area uninhabitable for months. A shame that it came to this but the plague must be contained.
Place in your inventory to gain increased wing flight time, but at the cost of reduced life regen.

Well done, you killed a plant.
It was used as a vessel to house the spirits of those unfortunate enough to find their way down here.
I wish you luck in dealing with the fallout.
Place in your inventory to gain increased item grab range.

A creature born of hatred and anger, formed by countless human souls with all of their energy entirely devoted to consuming others.
It seems a waste to have had such a potent source of power ravage mindlessly through these empty halls.
Place in your inventory to gain increased item grab range.

The ever-rejuvenating guardians of the profaned flame.
Much like a phoenix from the ashes their deaths are simply a part of their life cycle.
Many times my forces have had to destroy these beings in search of the Profaned Goddess.

A core surrounded by stone and flame, a simple origin and a simple goal.
What would have become of us had she not been defeated is a frightening concept to consider.
Place in your inventory to imbue all projectiles with profaned flames, causing them to inflict extra damage.
However, your max life is decreased due to a part of your soul being required to fuel the profaned flames.

As crude as the giant insects are they can prove useful in certain situations...given the ability to control them.
Place in your inventory to make small bees and weak hornets friendly.

The flesh golem constructed using twisted necromancy during the time of my conquest to counter my unstoppable forces.
Its creators were slaughtered by it moments after its conception. It is for the best that it has been destroyed.
Place in your inventory to gain an increase to all damage, but at the cost of reduced wing flight time.

Signus. The Void. The Weaver.
Each represent one of the Devourer’s largest spheres of influence.
Dispatching them has most likely invoked its anger and marked you as a target for destruction.

The curse is said to only affect the elderly.
After they are afflicted they become an immortal vessel for an ancient demon of the underworld.
Place in your inventory to gain increased damage while in the dungeon.
However, your max health is decreased due to Skeletron's curse.

What a silly and pointless contraption for something created with the essence of pure terror.
Draedon obviously took several liberties with its design...I am not impressed.
Place in your inventory to gain a boost to your armor penetration.
However, your max acceleration is decreased due to you feeling heavier.

It is a travesty, one of the most threatening biological terrors ever created.
If this creature were allowed to combine every slime on the planet it would become nearly unstoppable.
Place in your inventory to become slimed and able to slide around on tiles quickly, at the cost of reduced defense.
This effect makes dashing more difficult and does not work with mounts.

I remember the serene waves and the clear breeze.
The bitterness of my youth has long since subsided, but it is far too late. I must never repeat a mistake like this again.

The bio-mechanical watchers of the night, originally created as security using the souls extracted from human eyes.
These creatures did not belong in this world, it's best to be rid of them.
Place in your inventory to gain invisibility and rogue bonuses at night.
However, your defense is reduced while above 50% life due to you feeling softer.
Your max acceleration is reduced while below 50% life due to you feeling heavier.

These obsidian and hellstone towers were once home to thousands of...'people'.
Unfortunately for them, they were twisted by their inner demons until they were beyond saving.
Place in your inventory to prevent voodoo demons from spawning.

I see the deed is done.
The unholy amalgamation of flesh and hatred has been defeated.
Prepare to face the terrors that lurk in the light and dark parts of this world.
Place in your inventory to gain increased item grab range.

I would not be able to bear a world without my faithful companion by my side.
Fortunately, fate will have it so that it is a world I shall never have to see, for better or for worse.
Place in your inventory to gain nearly-infinite wing flight time, but at the cost of a 25% decrease to all damage.

How can a fish be used to dig through the ground?
Some questions are best left unanswered.
Right click to extract herbs and seeds
Right click to extract blood orbs
Camouflage is one of nature's best defenses

You ever get to see what would happen if a lizard that lived in the desert scurried too deep underground? I did, and they sure are cool! But it’s way too slippery for me to get my hands on it now. You go and get it so I can keep it as a pet!
Instructions.Translation: 你知道沙漠里的蜥蜴往地下钻的太深会发生什么吗？我知道，它们超酷的！可惜它们太滑了我没抓住。 你，现在就去把它抓来，这样我就有新的宠物了！

Instructions.Origin: An endangered fish that is highly prized in the market
Throwing these in an aquarium would be insanity

Summons a baby ghost bell light pet
Provides a moderate amount of light while underwater
The mark of a fallen angel
Sea serpents are pretty but not as pretty as the look on someone's face when they find one in their chair. I need you to fetch me the props for my next big scare, and the deadline is tomorrow.
Instructions.Translation: 海蛇其实还是很漂亮的，只要你不贸然侵入他们的领地。现在我命令你给我抓一条来作为给我的惊喜，限你一天之内完成！

Instructions.Origin:
Fires a concentrated laser to annihilate your foes
Defeated enemies explode into prism shards

Did you know that clams are a delicacy? Rumor has it that a big colony lives beneath the Desert. Just talking about them makes me hungry. I need you to fetch one for me, so I can practice my culinary skills and curb my hunger.
Instructions.Translation: 你知道蛤很美味吗?流言说沙漠地下住着一大群蛤，光是说说就觉得饿了。给我抓一只来，让我练习练习烹饪技巧，也顺便解解馋。

Instructions.Origin:
Fires three to five lines at once. Can fish in lava.
The battlefield is a scene of constant chaos.
The winner will be the one who controls that chaos, both the pole and the fish.

Fires six lines at once. Line never snaps.
The early bird catches the fish.

Fires two lines at once.
Just as you have tamed the jungle monster, you can now tame the fish in the sea.

Increased fishing power in space.
A silent head and beak lanced down and plucked it out by the head,
and the beak swallowed the little fish while its tail waved frantically.

While held, slowly electrifies nearby enemies.
The sea is a city.
Just below are highways, boulevards, streets and roundabouts bustling with submarine traffic.

Can fish in lava.
It is the burning lava of the soul that has a furnace within--a very volcano of grief and sorrow.

Fires ten lines at once. Line never snaps and can fish from lava.
The devourer was once just an Eater of Shoals.

Increased fishing power when in the tundra.
The ancient alloy's prismatic qualities are perfect for attracting fish.
This barely works, but it's better than nothing.

The wonders of angiogenesis

When you defeated the ancient goddess, her children fell in the lava as a result of the aftermath. Rumors say they mutated a fish, and I'd love if you fetched one for my new lava-filled fish tank.
Instructions.Translation: 在你击败硫磺火元素后，她的孩子们掉进了地狱的岩浆中。据说他们都化作了鱼，现在我要你给我搞到一条，这样我新准备的岩浆鱼缸就能派上用场了！

Instructions.Translation: 我知道我知道，要你去远古地狱遗迹的岩浆里钓鱼简直是不讲道理。我正准备这样做。还不快去？鱼可不会自己上钩！
